" it was clear from the mill that excess demand for some of the specific assets in financial markets reflects excessive supply of goods and services on the products market , which , on the other hand , led to excessive supply of labor markets . the consequence of that was clear , and it was clear to me that this was the case . in addition , you have also eliminated the excess demand for the financial assets of the supply of services and goods ( an inadequate aggregate demand ) , and the increased supply of labor ( mass unemployment ) .
